topics.body: Another funny story. My step-dad's grandmother has a working SNES hooked up to a CRT at her house. We were over for some family gathering and my step-dad looks at me and says "You wanna play some Mortal Kombat 2?" I look at step-dad and go "Hell yeah!" So we go ti the SNES and pop in MK2. And for the next hour and a half I GOT MY ASS KICKED. He was too good at Mortal Kombat! I was so salty!

I remember I was at my parents' house, chilling on the couch playing Bravely Default and he comes over and says "Is that Final Fantasy?" And I'm like "How do you know Final Fantasy?" And looks at me and goes "Because I beat Final Fantasy 3." My mind did a goddamn 180.
